      • getDeploymentTopology

        @RequestMapping(value="",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.deployment.DeploymentTopologyDTO> getDeploymentTopology(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                               String appId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                               String environmentId)
        Get the deployment topology of an application given an environment
        Parameters:
        appId - application Id
        environmentId - environment Id
        Returns:
        the deployment topology DTO

      • uploadDeploymentInputArtifact

        @RequestMapping(value="/inputArtifacts/{inputArtifactId}/upload",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.deployment.DeploymentTopologyDTO> uploadDeploymentInputArtifact(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String appId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String environmentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String inputArtifactId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile artifactFile)
        Upload an artifact to set it as input artifact.
        Parameters:
        appId - application Id
        environmentId - environment Id
        inputArtifactId - input artifact's id
        artifactFile - The multipart file that contains the uploaded artifact.
        Returns:
        The deployment topology dto that contains the current validation state for a deployment.

      • updateDeploymentInputArtifact

        @RequestMapping(value="/inputArtifacts/{inputArtifactId}/update",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.deployment.DeploymentTopologyDTO> updateDeploymentInputArtifact(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String appId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String environmentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String inputArtifactId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             org.alien4cloud.tosca.model.definitions.DeploymentArtifact artifact)
        Configure an input artifact to be fetched from repositories.
        Parameters:
        appId - application Id
        environmentId - environment Id
        inputArtifactId - input artifact's id
        artifact - The definition of the artifact to be fetched from repository.
        Returns:
        The deployment topology dto that contains the current validation state for a deployment.

      • updateDeploymentSetup

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<?> updateDeploymentSetup(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String appId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String environmentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    UpdateDeploymentTopologyRequest updateRequest)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             throws alien4cloud.paas.exception.OrchestratorDisabledException
        Parameters:
        appId - The application id
        environmentId - Id of the environment we want to update
        updateRequest - an UpdateDeploymentTopologyRequest object
        Returns:
        a RestResponse with:
        the DeploymentTopologyDTO if everything went well, the
        Error if not
        Throws:
        alien4cloud.paas.exception.OrchestratorDisabledException
